author: lukaszrozmej
content:
<@&836981603216654336> <@&688090867927482525> can you confirm that in https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7823 when baseLenght is 1025 (exp lenght 0, mod lenght 0) you consume all gas.

From spec `If any of these inputs are larger than the limit, the precompile execution stops, returns an error, and consumes all gas.`

Got a submission that we consume, but you don't.

author: lu_pinto
content: we do halt and consume all gas - that should be in execution spec tests no? it's part of our CI

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: <@&1360245480965017739> I am pretty sure there is a test for this

author: lukaszrozmej
content: Thx I think the submission is wrong then, wanted to confirm
